name: Treasure Hunt (BakenGamingStudios)
description:
Treasure Hunt is a game about chasing treasure.   You play as Joe, a down on his luck miner that needs to prove is worth in the miners guild.   

Traverse dangerous mines, battle evil foes, collect gold and treasure along the way.

Will you help joe achieve his goal of becoming a Master Miner?

**Game made for the 8bitstoinfinity Mouse Jam 2.  Theme : Chase**
